snippet: German prosecutors charged former President Christian Wulff with corruption on Friday, more than a year after he quit amid accusations that he had accepted favors from business executives before becoming president.
abstract: German prosecutors charge former Pres Christian Wulff with corruption, more than a year after he quit amid accusations that he had accepted favors from business executives before becoming president.
lead_paragraph: German prosecutors charged former President Christian Wulff with corruption on Friday, more than a year after he quit amid accusations that he had accepted favors from business executives before becoming president.
